name: gushy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
expressing positive feeling often in such a strong way that it seems too emotional or does not sound sincere: His fans tend to get a little gushy when they talk about him. I wanted to get my friend a card for her birthday, but they were all too gushy for my taste. Related word
gush
More examplesFewer examplesEarly in their relationship they were so gushy about each other that they couldn't talk about anything else. Most of his songs are gushy ballads about heartache and true love. Her guilty pleasure every December is watching Christmas movies featuring gushy love stories.
